concise_definition: n. （姓氏）菲利普斯（常见英文姓氏）

definitions.explanation_en: A surname of English origin, commonly associated with individuals such as Michael Phelps, the most decorated Olympian in history.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个源自英语的姓氏，常与迈克尔·菲尔普斯等人物相关联，他是历史上获得奥运奖牌最多的运动员。
definitions.example_en: Michael Phelps won 23 gold medals across five Olympic Games.
definitions.example_cn: 迈克尔·菲尔普斯在五届奥运会上赢得了23枚金牌。
